page.title: 03ST JOHN'S SCHOOL
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS IN THE VILLAGE OF ULLESKELF. THE OLDEST PART OF THE SCHOOL WAS BUILT AS A NATIONAL SCHOOL IN 1864. IT HAS TWO CLASSROOMS IN THE OLD BUILDING AND A WOODEN BUILDING WITH ONE CLASSROOM. AT PRESENT THERE ARE 27 CHILDREN IN SCHOOL, 12 IN THE INFANT CLASS AND 15 IN THE JUNIOR CLASS. THERE IS A HEADMISRESS, WHO TEACHES THE JUNIOR CLASS, AND A TEACHER WHO TEACHES THE INFANT CLASS. THERE IS A TEACHER WHO COMES IN PART TIME TO TEACH THE JUNIOR CLASS, AND A SCHOOL SECRETARY, WHO COMES IN ON TWO MORNINGS A WEEK. THE SCHOOL DINNERS ARE COOKED AT THE SCHOOL IN THE NEXT VILLAGE AND ARE BROUGHT IN BY TAXI. THERE IS A SUPERVISOR WHO SERVES THE DINNER AND LOOKS AFTER THE CHILDREN AT DINNERTIME.THERE IS A CARETAKER.
